blogPost.excerpt: Total.js Platform is a collection of libraries, packages, UI components, practices, and complete products written in pure JavaScript. Most of our libraries and UI components are without any 3rd party dependencies. Website: https://www.totaljs.com
blogPost.body: Total.js Platform is a collection of libraries, packages, UI components, practices, and complete products written in pure JavaScript. Most of our libraries and UI components are without any 3rd party dependencies. Website: https://www.totaljs.com
blogPost.title: Total.js Platform - Open-source JavaScript platform
blogPost.author: Peter Širka

localize.description: Total.js平台是一个用纯JavaScript编写的库、包、UI组件、实践和完整产品的集合。我们的大部分库和UI组件都没有任何第三方的依赖。网站：https://www.totaljs.com
Total.js平臺是一個用純JavaScript編寫的庫、包、UI組件、實踐和完整產品的集合。我們的大部分庫和UI組件都沒有任何第三方的依賴。網站：https://www.totaljs.com

next.excerpt: Acumen is the secret weapon dev teams use to deliver high-quality software on time. The platform unifies and analyzes engineering data to create a high-res picture of the team’s activities and recommends steps to avoid risks and boost productivity.
next.title: Acumen - GPS for software engineering teams

localize.description: Acumen是开发团队按时交付高质量软件的秘密武器。该平台统一并分析工程数据，以创建团队活动的高分辨率图像，并推荐避免风险和提高生产力的步骤。
Acumen是開發團隊按時交付高質量軟件的祕密武器。該平臺統一併分析工程數據，以創建團隊活動的高分辨率圖像，並推薦避免風險和提高生產力的步驟。
